channel.title: HDMI cable broken
channel.description:
I've gotten an HDMI cable a couple days ago, and it cost around $50. (In canada it's expensive.) Today, I wanted to connect it to the only TV that has HDMI, and my grandma from hell that always pisses me off, got me so pissed off, after installing Ubuntu and making all the fixes, that I yanked the cable from the TV as I did with the other cables, and when I got to my room, I found out that the pins were pushed out and into the center.
Is there any possible way to fix the pins on an HDMI cable, or should I got wasting another $50 on another HDMI cable?

item.title: HDMI cable broken
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Cheapest I have found one to buy was $25, I still bet you could fix yours though.

Read full topic

item.title: HDMI cable broken
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:9, topic:187962”][quote author=Rajae link=topic=250612.msg2102065#msg2102065 date=1205213646]
If only I could buy from an American store…
[/quote]

Yea, because our dollar exchange is taking a huge dump right now.
We’re actually lower than the Canadian dollar :([/quote]
Exactly why I want to buy from there online!

Also, their HDMI cables are $7.00 cheapest, incredibly lower than here in Canada.

Read full topic

item.title: HDMI cable broken
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

Actually, $50 was the cheapest I could find ($49.99 to be exact (rounding)). However, lots of online Canadian stores have cheaper I found, and they are located near me, so I’m going to go to one of those places.

If only I could buy from an American store…

item.description:

$50 on a HDMI cable. You’re having a laugh. Shop around, with HDMI, price doesn’t mean it’s better.

@Rajae wrote:

Uhh HDMI cables are like £15 here in england, which is around $30 CAD. Try finding a cheaper one i’m sure they must sell them cheaper somewhere.

I’ll look around. There are more stores than one.

item.title: HDMI cable broken
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

I tried pushing the pins back into the holes, but somehow, the holes broke while I was doing it. Now I think there is no way to fix it since they will stay in the center all the time.

I’m too angry to even attempt, so I might as well get another one.

Read full topic

item.title: HDMI cable broken

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I would try to fix it, you don’t really have anything to lose at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: HDMI cable broken
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Something like this happened to me before, if you can get a screwdriver with a small head and move the pins.

Read full topic
